description.en: High-quality image generation using Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large with Dual CLIP text encoding
description.de: Hochwertige Bildgenerierung mit Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large und Dual CLIP Text-Encoding

context: Transform the input text into an optimized image generation prompt. Focus on visual details, composition, lighting, and artistic style. Be descriptive and specific to help the image model generate high-quality results.

parameters.NEGATIVE_PROMPT: blurry, bad quality, watermark, text, distorted, malformed, disfigured, low resolution

meta.notes: SD3.5 Large uses Dual CLIP (clip_g + t5xxl) for superior text understanding. Best quality at 1024x1024 resolution.
